# NETWORK::NETWORK_LEAVE_PED_BEHIND_BEFORE_WARP

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** playerIndex
* **FLOAT** newCoorsX
* **FLOAT** newCoorsY
* **FLOAT** newCoorsZ
* **BOOL** killPed = false
* **BOOL** keepPickups = false: If true then any portable pickups attached to the player are kept attached to him, otherwise they are detached

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Leave an AI ped behind in place of the player when they are being warped to a new location

p4 and p5 are always 0 in scripts
